lines.text: Maybe... the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> took a <c=#0000FF>Living Memory</c> at a moment when he wasn't breathing?
And then... it's the hologram that makes it seem like he doesn't have a pulse?
I'm no magic expert, but I'm pretty sure that's not how holograms work.
Wait- no. What if the whole wizard is an opaque colored hologram?
...hey, that reminds me of a different idea that isn't related at all!
